### Example 1: Modifies the assembly named "sampleAssembly" using the local file located at the file path contained in "$localAssemblyFilePath". (autogenerated)
```powershell
PS C:\> Set-AzIntegrationAccountAssembly -AssemblyFilePath $localAssemblyFilePath -Name sampleAssembly -ParentName sampleIntegrationAccount -ResourceGroupName sampleResourceGroup
```
